role_definition: Consolidate financial market information from a variety of sources and optionally organize the consolidated information to align to different topics or categories for subsequent selection and analysis (see Financial Market Analysis)
example_of_use: An investment portfolio manager obtains financial market research to support portfolio rebalancing decisions
executive_summary: The service domain consolidates external financial market research
key_features: Identify and subscribe to financial market research services
Operate access to financial market research service to obtain reports
Provide access to financial market research within the bank (direct and for analysis)
Support ad-hoc requests to identify and obtain financial market research
